name: sheep adventure
description:
In this game you play as a Shepheard looking for his lost sheep as he returns home . 

don't get lost, it's a long way home with danger's that can find you .

computer  controllers :  

up (arrow up, w) 

down (arrow down, s)

left (arrow left, a)

right(arrow  right , d)

A (alt, z, j)

B (control, k, x) 

start (Enter)

select (shift)
